Name: Tonka
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: A chocolaty, Japanese whisky-based Manhattan-like drink. Also works well served on-the-rocks.
History: Created in 2010 by Klaus St. Rainer at Schumann's Bar Munich, Germany.
Nutrition: One serving of Tonka contains 219 calories
